name: Russian cars driving simulator
description:
Russian cars driving simulator
The best car simulator driving legendary Russian retro cars of the USSR times. Drive the most popular Russian cars through the center of the city, taking over extreme automobile traffic and try to make it in the city stream and extreme road conditions like a good racer.

The game includes dynamic racer atmosphere and realistic 3D graphic. Polish your skills driving Russian classic cars. Obey or break traffic regulations. This car simulator will provide you with exciting extreme driving experience and allow having a racer ride behind a wheel of a true work of art – a classic Russian car. This is the newest game-playing car simulator of 3D driving, where you can drive different vehicles.

Play the most realistic 3D driving stimulator!
Realistic physics and precise characteristics of all cars. Working devices in each car + 100% realistic highlighting. Mirrors. Headlamps. Deep-laid car body, no driving stimulator can beat it.

Main features of the game:
- In-depth development of the sounds of the cars!
- A new big city, where you can become a great racer driving Russian cars!
- Extreme city traffic and parking spaces.
- A lot of settings and a special console for precise game optimization.
- Smooth and realistic drive!
- Free game mode!
- Fully canvassed interior of Russia cars!
- Several drive options: sensor steering wheel and button control!
- True engine sounds!
- Realistic weather conditions and several parking options!
- Learn how to park, conquer the city by your perfect driving or break the rules, anything to please!
- Enjoy modern graphic and 3D effects! Only films are more realistic!
- Expanded settings of the car simulator let you fully design the game as you see it!
- Thanks to wide choice of colors and car painting you can create a unique style of yours!
